Published November 20 2014

A smaller, more powerful leaf blower engine

A smaller, more powerful leaf blower engine — It’s amazing how we continue to make non-electronic things smaller and more powerful. Plus, the entire premise of a combustion engine is just cool: hundred of tiny, controlled explosions are the (literal) driving force that help you clean off your sidewalk.

Enjoy your day.
